title: Digital Vault
subtitle: Financial Cyber Resilience
themeSummary: Exploring the intersection of finance and digital security

sections.label: Cover Story
sections.title: The Future of Financial Security
sections.subtitle: How AI is reshaping cyber defense in banking
keyPoints: AI-powered threat detection reduces response time by 95%
Quantum encryption protects against future threats
sections.pullQuote: The cost of prevention is always less than the cost of recovery.
sections.bodyMarkdown:
# The Evolution of Cyber Defense

Financial institutions face unprecedented challenges in protecting customer data and assets. Traditional security measures are no longer sufficient against sophisticated threat actors.

## AI-Driven Security

Machine learning algorithms now monitor billions of transactions per second, identifying anomalies that would be impossible for humans to detect.

## The Human Factor

Despite technological advances, employee training remains the first line of defense. Organizations that invest in security awareness see 70% fewer successful attacks.
